original_title: Les chroniques de l'île du roi boiteux (n°1: Pâques. n°2: Les enfants du serpent)
overview: A documentary in two parts on magic in the Philippines, shot in the witchcraft island of Siquijor. First part: Easter: Easter season's sorcerers' magic potions, curses and healing. Second part: Children of the serpent: The magical power given by the snake to the peasants shamans.
title: Les chroniques de l'île du roi boiteux (n°1: Pâques. n°2: Les enfants du serpent)
